title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, cotton and metal-wrapped cotton threads on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, and cross stitches, with deflected element work with overcasting.  knot, herringbone, overcast cords, and running stitches.  On back, applique of silk warp, metal weft.
description: Marking sampler with alphabets, names, and initials with motifs and crowns.  In the center the name Louise, a coat of arms, and a town on the riverside.
name: Sampler
